Package ArenaGame

Class EnemyGladiator

java.lang.Object
ArenaGame.Gladiator
ArenaGame.EnemyGladiator
public class EnemyGladiator extends Gladiator
EnemyGladiator represents an AI-controlled gladiator. Chooses actions automatically during its turn.

      public EnemyGladiator(String name, int health, int maxHealth, int attack, int defense, Random randNum)
      Create a new enemy gladiator.

      defense - defense value
      randNum - random generator for decisions

  • Method Details

    • takeTurn

      public void takeTurn(Gladiator opponent)
      Enemy takes its turn by choosing to attack, guard, or taunt. Decision is based on health, opponent health, or random chance.
      Specified by:
      takeTurn in class Gladiator
      Parameters:
      opponent - the player or gladiator being fought
